channel.title: Client Help (i have been having this problem for ever) PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Please read whole thing, i really need help
I have a problem that when i run a client, and try to log on to my server (with 127.0.0.1 IP), and it shows the screen, then i get logged out
1. I run my Batch file to start my server
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/11/19/f_1m_4e34c72.png[/img]
2. Then i run my client Batch file, which starts the client log in page
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/11/19/f_2m_b2f156f.png[/img]
3. Then i enter my username and password, and 127.0.0.1 as IP
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/11/19/f_3m_0e3077c.png[/img]
4. Then i hit log in, then this screen comes up
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/11/19/f_4m_0b7738d.png[/img]
5. Then i get logged out
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/11/19/f_5m_70d53f6.png[/img]
6. Then, i go back to the client Batch file, to see what happened, and i see this
[img]http://img32.picoodle.com/img/img32/3/11/19/f_6m_cdbe672.png[/img]
Please, Someone! I really need help with this!

item.title: Client Help (i have been having this problem for ever) PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

the only thing i can say is that ur client isnt compatible with ur server. so either get a new client or new server. or both.but how to fix this im not sure. never seen such error

Read full topic
